name: todo-chat
description: A simple todo chat app, using natural-language-commander

scripts.copy: mkdirp dist && ncp src/index.html dist/index.html && ncp src dist --filter .+\.css
scripts.start: budo src/app.ts:app.js --live --open --dir ./src -- -p [ tsify ] -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --extensions .ts ] -t [ stringify --extensions [ .html ] ]
scripts.build: browserify src/app.ts -p [ tsify ] -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --extensions .ts .ts ]  -t [ stringify --extensions [ .html ] ] -o dist/app.js
scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && npm run copy && typings install

author: whenther
